game.name: Misha Adventures
game.shortDescription: 미샤의 모험은 미샤 곰 공장을 설정 악한 벌레를 물리 치고 오염에서 숲을 저장해야하는 도전적인 플랫 포머입니다.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Misha Adventures is a challenging platformer in which you have to help Misha the bear save the forest from pollution.

reviewHighlights.text: Misha Adventures is a challenging platformer in which Misha the bear must save the forest from pollution by defeating an evil worm that has set up a f...
The game is pretty cool. I like playing as Misha and trying to save the forest. It’s fun and not boring.
